mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ms_knowledge_sharing WHERE sharing_title LIKE CONCAT('%', COALESCE(#{sharingTitle}, ''), '%') AND sharing_subtitle LIKE CONCAT('%', COALESCE(#{sharingSubtitle}, ''), '%') AND sharing_introduce LIKE CONCAT('%', COALESCE(#{sharingIntroduce}, ''), '%') AND honoured_guest LIKE CONCAT('%', COALESCE(#{honouredGuest}, ''), '%') AND is_release LIKE CONCAT('%', COALESCE(#{isRelease}, ''), '%') AND is_link LIKE CONCAT('%', COALESCE(#{isLink}, ''), '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ms_knowledge_sharing(sharing_id, sharing_title, sharing_subtitle, sharing_introduce, sharing_content, sharing_sign, cover_url, honoured_guest, is_release, is_link, link, author) VALUES (#{sharingId}, #{sharingTitle}, #{sharingSubtitle}, #{sharingIntroduce}, #{sharingContent}, #{sharingSign}, #{coverUrl}, #{honouredGuest}, #{isRelease}, #{isLink}, #{link}, #{author})
